name: TheAtlantic
text: In this week's "Dear Therapist," @LoriGottlieb1 advises a reader who is struggling to get through the holiday season after her parents' divorce several years ago. https://t.co/03xkcY3QSB

name: TheAtlantic
text: It might be tempting to try to draw meaning from a rare cosmic conjunction—but first, go outside tonight and see Jupiter and Saturn, @marinakoren writes. https://t.co/DBQGh4Qp5i

name: TheAtlantic
text: Zoom will not make public transit obsolete, @JSadikKhan and @SethSolomonow predict. "In post-pandemic America," they write, "restoring transit will be as essential as restoring power lines, water mains, and roads after a natural or economic disaster." https://t.co/yO5Nv319hL

name: TheAtlantic
text: Some evidence has suggested that taking melatonin could help slow COVID-19. But the real key may be sleep itself, @jameshamblin reports: https://t.co/NM6aAxccIL

name: TheAtlantic
text: Today is #NationalCrosswordPuzzleDay. Earlier this year, we expanded our puzzles to the weekend and launched a new feature that allows you to play with friends. If you’re inspired to join our crossword-puzzle community, here are some tips for beginners: https://t.co/2UVPlhHZfg

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @JeffreyGoldberg: "Biden does not yet appear to have defined the limits of Kerry’s role and explained how it will be integrated into the broader strategy. This has some of Biden’s other advisers worried." -- @thomaswright08:
https://t.co/mhPD74Rw33

name: TheAtlantic
text: The president’s refusal to accept the outcome of the election will leave a dangerous legacy. The latest Atlantic Daily, by @mimbsy: https://t.co/aIJEv5sNuM
